properties.areaDesc: Northwest Plateau; Northwest Deserts; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 1 at 11:37PM PST until February 3 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest and west winds of 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to
60 mph. Elevations above 5000 feet could see gusts up to 70
mph.

* WHERE...Mohave County, Arizona including the cities of Kingman,
Colorado City, Wikieup, Bullhead City, Oatman, Mohave Valley,
Dolan Springs, and Golden Valley.

* WHEN...From 5 PM MST Sunday to 7 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Dangerous driving conditions, especially for high-
profile vehicles. Waves of 2 to 3 feet will be possible during
the strongest winds on Lake Mead making boating very dangerous
as well. Additionally, power outages due to downed trees or
power poles are possible. Securing any loose items such as trash
cans, outdoor plants, sports equipment, or trampolines, is
highly recommended. Areas of blowing dust are also possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest speeds are expected late Sunday
afternoon and evening, lingering into the overnight hours Sunday
night as a cold front passes. Speeds will decrease through the
morning hours Monday but could remain gusty through the
afternoon hours.
properties.instruction:
People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around
trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of
your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use extreme
caution if you must drive, especially if you are operating a
semi-truck or panel truck with a wide trailer.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SUNDAY TO 7 PM MST MONDAY
